entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Carignan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:40 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, 0.2°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with rain. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy mixed with rain. Snowfall amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late this evening. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Snowfall amount 10 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
